participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is passionate about her dream of becoming a lawyer and values hard work.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jake Miller
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys the thrill of skateboarding and embraces the challenges that come with it.
participant_2.background: my friends are all skateboarders. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden.
